data.title: Tom Lee Says Bitcoin, Ethereum Crash Wasn't Macro But A 'Software Bug'
data.description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) breaking below key support levels has sparked debate over whether fundamentals are to blame — but Fundstrat's Tom Lee argues the real culprit is far more mechanical. What Happened: In an interview with ...
data.keywords: Tom Lee, Ethereum, market makers, Jeff Bezos, Bitcoin, Lee, real estate
